headline: CSX CEO: Obsession with profit margins stunting railroads’ growth
summary: CSX CEO Joe Hinrichs states that railroads' focus on profit margins over growth has led to stagnant traffic levels. The post CSX CEO: Obsession with profit margins stunting railroads’ growth appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: CSX CEO: Obsession with profit margins stunting railroads’ growth
raw.summary: CSX CEO Joe Hinrichs states that railroads' focus on profit margins over growth has led to stagnant traffic levels. The post CSX CEO: Obsession with profit margins stunting railroads’ growth appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Canadian National Railway (TSX:CNR) Expanding All-Rail Intermodal Service With CSX
summary: CN and CSX recently announced a memorandum of understanding to develop a new all-rail intermodal service into Nashville, Tennessee, offering international container shipments a faster, more sustainable route from Canada’s West Coast directly through Memphis. This agreement, together with CN’s recent expansion of its wildfire preparedness and its collaboration with Canada’s pulse and special crops industry, reflects a deepening focus on operational resilience and customer-oriented service...
